<page title>: NEC Display E554 55" 1080p LED LCD TV 16 9 HDTV 1080p 120 Hz | eBay
marketing information: The 55" NEC E554, an LED edge-lit, commercial-grade display, is ideal for education, corporate and other digital signage applications. Compared to previous generation displays, this model's edge-lit LED backlighting allows for reduced power consumption, a thinner depth, a smaller bezel and lighter weight. Full HD resolution delivers stunning image quality for a variety of content, and the E554's integrated tuner and speakers allow users to enjoy high-definition broadcast capabilities. This display can be monitored remotely through the RS-232C networking feature, which also provides customers the ability to synchronize multiple displays, remotely power on/off and lock out external buttons to prevent unwanted changes in the display's setting.
miscellaneous: Package Contents 55" LED Edge-lit Commercial-Grade Display w/ Integrated Tuner Wireless Remote Control Power Cord VGA Cable (Mini 15-pin D-sub) Batteries CD-ROM (User Manual) Stand Thumbscrews RS-232 Adaptor
product name: 55" LED Edge-lit Commercial-Grade Display w/ Integrated Tuner
